name: Stickmen can´t jump
description:
Oh no, I did it again! Created with the marvelous pocket-platformer from l0bster !

Get your papertowels - it is getting sticky this time! Meet Sticky the stickman. Sticky is an idiot. He can´t do maths, he cant cook, he even can´t jump! Can you survive the hand drawn levels? Are you stick enough for reaching the green flag? 

If your answer is no, a stickman dies - and you don´t want a stickman to die, do you? So bring your stick in position, spit in your hands and start collecting those green flags, because Sticky loves green flags! Some believe that he is a distant relative of Plok, but that´s just a rumor.

This game features:

  • Hand drawn sprites
  • Green flags
  • Trampolines. So many trampolines!
  • A very big notepad
  • Ink bridges
  • Sticky the stickman
